metadata.description: When a computer nerd in Quagmire, USA unwittingly installs a fragment of an evil supercomputer's code, it takes master control of computers and networks everywhere.  But with its attention on high-end systems, there's a back door into its world: the latest in 8-bit technology.  Yet even with whole kilobytes of classic game heroes helping the NHS crew, can they pull its plug, or will it be their end of line?
metadata.name: Super N.H.S.
